post_title: WTB- SGC T206 Cobb bat on or green port. FOUND!
post_content: I am looking for an SGC graded T206 Cobb bat on or Green portrait.

You sent several actually. Your forum join date is 11-21-23. Thirty seven posts so far all on the same day. Nice try.
